casebody.data:
DISCRETIONARY APPEALS ALLOWED

99-1333. State v. Dixon.

Lucas App. No. L-97-1318. Discretionary appeal allowed; sua sponte, cause held for the decision in 98-1779, State v. Conyers, Lucas App. No. L-97-1327, and 98-1929, State v. Schultz, Hamilton App. No. C-970954; briefing schedule stayed.
